CustomField.description: This checkbox field serves as a control mechanism to manage the sending of mid-implementation communications. When checked, it serves as a signal to the system or to users that a mid-implementation communication should be suppressed for the associated project, ensuring that the POC does not receive it.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: checked, signals to the system that a mid-implementation communication should be suppressed for the associated project, ensuring that the POC does not receive it.
CustomField.label: No Check In Email
